author: Crofty 🇺🇦
text: I was treated first hand to how overloaded the NHS is last night. It was awful. I wanted to hug the staff so hard, they were so lovely when it was clear they’re running on empty. It’s an absolute travesty what the tories have done. I’ve honestly never seen anything like it #nhs

author: Crofty 🇺🇦
text: Stop letting them tell you you mustn’t exclude them from your perspective of life as a woman. Stop letting them centre themselves and call it being inclusive. Why the hell would you, as a woman, write anything from a land perspective, you’re not a man 🤦🏻‍♀️

author: Crofty 🇺🇦
text: I’m getting tired of joining things dedicated to women & seeing ‘ a man said I only post from a woman’s perspective so here’s something I wrote about men’ . . . Removed from my feed. Why, as a woman, isn’t your reply, but I’m a woman, write your own stuff then?

author: Crofty 🇺🇦
text: I have known four alcoholics in my lifetime and they were vile drunk. It’s a horrible, debilitating addiction but they were not lovely when under the influence of large amounts of alcohol regularly.

author: Crofty 🇺🇦
text: I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again. You do not have to forgive anyone to move on. You can absolutely hate the feck out of them, know they did you wrong and they’re an absolute piece of turd and still move on just fine. Toxic positivity is bull ❤️
